title: Gualtiero Piccinini, “Physical Computation: A Mechanistic Account” (Oxford UP, 2016)
description:
A popular way of thinking about the mind and its relation to physical stuff is in terms of computation. This general information-processing approach to solving the mind-body problem admits of a number of different, often incompatible, elaborations. In Physical Computation: A Mechanistic Account (Oxford University Press, 2016), Gualtiero Piccinini integrates...
